sources.name: MovieSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MovieSource

transformations.name: Grouping
transformations.script:
MovieSource aggregate(groupBy(title),
	moviecount = sum(1),
		movie = max(movie)) ~> Grouping

transformations.name: dupes
transformations.script:
MovieSource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	))~> dupes

transformations.name: DedupedRowJoin
transformations.script:
Grouping, dupes join(Grouping@movie == dupes@movie,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> DedupedRowJoin
